frontmatter.title: NanoNeuron - 7 simple JS functions that explain how machines learn
frontmatter.summary: The NanoNeuron.js code example contains 7 simple JavaScript functions (which touches on model prediction, cost calculation, forward/backwards propagation, and training) that will give you a feeling of how machines can actually learn. No 3rd-party libraries, no external data-sets or dependencies, only pure and simple JavaScript functions.
